dt: {bc}a member of a Muslim religious order noted for devotional exercises (such as bodily movements leading to a trance)
{bc}one that whirls or dances with or as if with the abandonment of a dervish

shortdef: a member of a Muslim religious order noted for devotional exercises (such as bodily movements leading to a trance)
one that whirls or dances with or as if with the abandonment of a dervish
